++ Process Computing Process



* Contains one or more "Kernel Threads"(ProcessComputingThread(s))
  * they share eachothers resources (memory, file handles)
  
* A ProcessComputingProcess is a unit of resources, 
  * A ProcessComputingThread is a unit of ProcessComputingScheduling and execution
  
* Resources allocated by an ProcessComputingOperatingSystem: OperatingSystem
